info.brief: I have several years of experience working as backend and full stack developer in various domains using PHP with Laravel and the Python with frameworks like Flask and Django. My main interests are Open Source Software, Information Security, and Cryptography. Lately my tools of choice have been OS X, Git, and Python. Most of my time is spent reading new InfoSec publications or contributing to open source projects.

speaking.title: Certificate in Small Business Cyber Security Strategy - Lunch and Learn
speaking.location: Illinois Small Business Development Center at Bradley University
speaking.summary: Participants will learn how to protect themselves and their customers against cybercriminals, security breaches and inside threats.

history.summary: Lead Developer on Critical Infrastructure agentless device inventory product
highlights: Reverse engineer protocols from industrial devices and integrate them into our product
Supported indusrtial and networking hardware from Seimens PLCs, SEL Relays, Cisco IOS and ASA, Emerson, Allen-Bradley, etc.
Write and review code in PowerShell, Python, C#
Deliver training on Ansible Architecture for developing modules and plugins and additional connection types
Maintain a massive suite of modifications to Ansible core and AWX
Contract to hire through Robert Half Technology

history.summary: Developing internal tooling, integrations, and automation
highlights: Worked on automating lots of networking hardware, F5 Load Balancers, Sandvine SDEs
Decomissionioned a CMDB as part of an aquisition and migrated customers to the new platform.
Deployed, maintained, and monitored applications and databases in an anycasted and geodiverse environement.
Built a CLI interface and usable web GUI for automation and mgmt of auth providers on Ping Identity
Contract to Hire through Beacon Hill Staffing

history.position: Consultant - Business Development, Investor Pitching, and Software Development
history.summary: Developed middleware platforms and assisted /w customer and funding acquisition.
highlights: Built an SDK /w C/C++ & SWIG for integration developers.
Built frontend prototypes /w React.js & backend production code /w Django.
Worked with Integris Engineering to Draw and File Patents for IP I created on behalf of Notionovus
Completed Bradley's Brave Launch Startup Program and pitched a panel of Investors

history.position: Python Developer - Full Stack Web Development with Django
history.summary: Maintained a legacy suite of Building Engineering Commissioning Software /w Django.
highlights: Fully Automated a CI/CD system, dramatically improving development time
Produced consistent dev environment with Vagrant/Virtualbox and deploy environment with Docker
Ported the project from Django 1.4 to Django 1.8
Solved a nightmare bug in an asynchronous JavaScript notification module

history.summary: Migrated a 14 year old Forms VB 6 App to a HIPAA Compliant Django web-app
highlights: Unified dev & deploy environments with Vagrant
Built a new SQL Schema and migration pipeline to move 10k+ patient records from AccessDB to PostgreSQL
Developed AWS Lambda Functions in Python

history.summary: Monitored, Maintained, and Audited an Electronics E-Commerce Side
highlights: Worked through PCI-AE SA and ensured compliant card processiong
Wrote Utility Scripts for System Maintenance in Python
Installed SSL Certificates and Enabled HTTPS Transport Layer Security

history.summary: Developed and maintained PHP web scraping framework, custom scrapers, and Chrome Plugin
highlights: Improved System for Updating 800,000+ records every minute
Wrote Scrapers for over 70 Major E-Commerce Retailers
Developed Chrome Plugin to add convenience and usability to the service

history.title: AS
curriculum: CMPSC-212 Advanced C++ and Data Structures

history.summary: Host and organizer of events in and around Peoria and Bloomington IL. Helping people learn to code /w a focus on modern JavaScript. Coffee and code!
Taught Eclipse, Java, and the FIRST Robotics toolkit to a team of highschool students to prepare them for competition.
highlights: Team Awarded 'Highest Rookie Seed' and 'Rookie All Star'
Iowa Reigonal Semi-finalists

history.summary: Worked with a team of individuals supporting financial literacy in children and teens that supports area schools. Provided support on a custom built PHP application simulating the stock market. Managed donor tables and acted as a broker for the simulation.
highlights: Since having observed and help coordinate the stock market simulation software I have been working with JA to produce a new application which will be donated upon completion.

history.summary: After a tornado struck Wahsington, IL I helped out a handful of organizations in the area with accepting, organizing, and distributing donations at local schools and churches.
Helped local school restore and maintain information on servers after a power outage and system failure.
highlights: Full Disaster Recovery in under 24 hours

testimonials.name: Nathan House
testimonials.quote: Jay is knowledgeable, honest, and hard working. I look forward to collaborating with him on other projects in the future.

testimonials.name: Tannen Skriver
testimonials.quote: A fantastic person and friend, Jay has shown to posess the the focus, diligence, and efficiency to complete complex assignments while also being an invaluble source of wisdom and kindness. I would trust him with my life.
